name: Eremite Floral Ring-Dancer
title: "Whirling Memories" Eremite Floral Ring-Dancer
desc: "The children of the desert have a rich tradition of song and dance. Originally used to praise and serve the gods, the crafts were later adapted for battle and the seduction of kings."

attributes.source: Reward for accepting the Tavern Challenge at The Cat's Tail and claiming victory in a Friendly Fracas with the Eremite Floral Ring-Dancer

skills.name: Spiraling Whirl
skills.desc: Deals $[D__KEY__DAMAGE_3] Dendro DMG, creates 1 stack of Spirit-Serpent's Blessing.

skills.name: Spirit of Omen's Awakening: Dendro Spirit-Serpent
skills.desc: Deals 4 Dendro DMG. Once each Match, add 1 Spirit of Omen: Dendro Spirit-Serpent card to your Hand. (Characters with Spirit of Omen: Dendro Spirit-Serpent equipped can use the Technique: Viny Razorscale)

skills.name: Spirit of Omen's Power
skills.desc: (Passive) After this character takes DMG: If this character has no more than 7 HP, they gain 1 Energy. (Once per Round)
